mapper.select: select MAX(missionid) as missionid from zdh2_mission u
select cbkid,cbkname,description,picturepath from zdh2_cbklist u where user = #{user}
select cbkid from zdh2_cbklist u where cbkname = #{cbkname} and description = #{description} and user = #{user}
select picturepath,cbkid,picturename from zdh2_cbkpicture where pictureid in (${pictureid})
mapper.delete: delete from zdh2_cbkpicture where pictureid in (${pictureid})
mapper.select: select missionid,datetime,style,query from zdh2_mission u where user = #{user} order by missionid desc

SELECT d.pictureid,d.similarpicturename,d.picturepath,d.point,d.cbkid from zdh2_picture a RIGHT JOIN (select c.pictureid,b.picturename,b.point,b.similarpicturename,c.picturepath,c.cbkid from zdh2_result b left join zdh2_cbkpicture c on b.similarpicturename = c.picturename) d on a.picturename=d.picturename WHERE a.pictureid = #{pictureid} and (d.point >= #{pointmin} and d.point <= #{pointmax})
select * from zdh2_mission u where user = #{user} and datetime = #{datetime}
select count(pictureid) as pictureid from zdh2_picture u where missionid =#{missionid}
select count(id) as pictureid from zdh2_result u where missionid =#{missionid}
select cbkname,cbkid from zdh2_cbklist u where cbkid in (${checkcbk})
